article_title: The Wemstroms: Here's how the 'death tax' really works
article_text:
By Chuck and Pat Wemstrom

Posted Apr 28, 2016 at 10:09 AM

Updated Apr 28, 2016 at 4:56 PM

article_metadata.description: We received a letter from something called the National Tax Limitation Committee, or NTLC, asking us to stop “the ObamaCare Death Tax.” The letter, from NTLC President Lew Uhler, claims “this secret provision ... allows states to seize your assets after you pass to take back any money or services you got from Medicaid.” The letter asks us to sign a petition to our senators, and of course, send money to the NTLC.The provision could hardly be “secret,” as
article_metadata.author: Chuck and Pat Wemstrom
